Description: Fragment preserving profile of an Attic black-glazed and stamped pottery plate. Ring foot; rounded, slightly up-turned rim, offset on the outside. Glazed save for offset and stand-ring. Six palmettes and rouletting on floor. Incised inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 582)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1914)
